name: FRESH RAIN SHOWER HAIR & BODY MIST 150ML (5.7 FL. OZ).
description: Hair and body mist. Refreshing, serene and enveloping. This fragrance awakens a feeling of purity and calm, like walking barefoot on damp grass or opening a window to the fresh air after the storm. Fresh bergamot, wild violet and soft musks recreate the tranquillity of a summer rain shower.

name: FLORAL FRUITY CRUSH HAIR & BODY MIST 150ML (5.7 FL. OZ).
description: Hair and top mist. Fun, daring and utterly addictive. A fragrance with character that captures the excitement of love at first sight and the energy of a spontaneous moment. Juicy pear, blooming gardenia and enveloping patchouli combine in a vibrant and feminine contrast.

name: SOLAR SUMMER SKIN BODY CREAM 230ML (7.78 FL. OZ)

Its enveloping texture deeply moisturises, leaving a luminous trail that conveys the unique sensation of a day in the sun.

description: Eau de parfum. An exquisite fusion of peach blossom and coconut water that gives way to a harmonious bouquet of orange blossom and sambac jasmine, evoking a garden in full bloom under the moonlight. An unexpected touch of salted vanilla adds a sensual depth, leaving an irresistible trail on the leather.

description:
NUDE BOUQUET: Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid includes notes of cherry, peony and vanilla. It is a fresh, cosy and vibrant fragrance.

FIELDS AT NIGHTFALL: Ambery eau de parfum. It includes notes of praline, jasmine and sandalwood.
notes: ZARA NUDE BOUQUET EAU DE PARFUM ZARA FIELDS AT NIGHTFALL EAU DE PARFUM

name: LIGHTLY BLOOM EDP + DEEP GARDEN EDP 2 X 30 ML / 2 X 1.01 OZ

DEEP GARDEN: Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid includes notes of pear, tuberose and tonka bean. It’s a fresh, luminous and feminine fragrance.
notes: ZARA LIGHTLY BLOOM EAU DE PARFUM ZARA DEEP GARDEN EAU DE PARFUM

name: FIERCE LOVE EDP 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. Limited edition. The fresh notes of myrtle and rose water blend with the sophisticated sweetness of Turkish delight and tonka bean, while a warm base of tobacco, vetiver and patchouli envelops the senses with sensuality.

name: LOVE EXPLOSION SPECIAL EDITION EDP 30 ML / 1.01 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A LIMITED EDITION fragrance that combines the captivating charm of Red Temptation with the elegance of Rose Gourmand, a luxurious fusion of sparkling rose and soothing vanilla. With floral, fruity and gourmand amber notes, this fragrance is composed of top notes of bergamot, bitter orange and peony, middle notes of rose, praline and amber, and base notes of moss, vanilla and musk.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION SANDALWOOD EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50ML (1.7 FL. OZ).
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentration in this perfume extract. Introducing Sandalwood Extrait, a sublime and elevated reinterpretation of our iconic Red Temptation. Elegant and intense sandalwood takes centre stage, enhanced by refined touches of spicy white pepper and saffron. A delicate powdery veil of violet and iris enhances the deep woody fusion of sophisticated white sandalwood, grey amber and an irresistible creamy tonka bean, creating a unique perfume.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION TOBACCO EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50 ML / 1.69 OZ
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentration. Introducing Tobacco Extrait, a bold reinterpretation of our iconic Red Temptation. Experience the intoxicating burst of spicy tobacco notes, illuminated by the delicate sweetness of fresh pink pepper and our iconic saffron, while an opulent jasmine sambac blends with a fiery rock rose to create a delicious and intense trail.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION VANILLE EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50ML (1.7 FL. OZ)
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentration. Introducing Vanille Extrait, the ultimate expression of our iconic Red Temptation, an intensified perfume that magnifies its essence. A symphony of spices, most notably saffron, is enriched with a luxurious cocoa and a generous amount of vanilla. The radiant floral sensuality of jasmine and vanilla orchid, which evolves perfectly into a potent fusion of vanilla and amber, creating an irresistible and unforgettable charm.

name: SWEET PASTRY IN PARIS EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ)
description:
Limited edition – back for a limited time only.

Eau de parfum. Be transported by the charm of a morning in Paris, where the air is filled with the sweet scent of an artisan patisserie.
A Sweet Pastry in Paris is a feminine and addictive fragrance that envelops the senses with the sparkling freshness of lemon, the sweetness of sugar cane and the enveloping warmth of velvety vanilla.

Created by renowned perfumer Nathalie Lorson, this olfactory gem is a tribute to the small pleasures of Paris. A gourmand experience that awakens nostalgia and desire, available again for a limited time only.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., WATER (AQUA), FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE...

name: A MOCHI ATELIER IN TOKYO 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).
description:
Limited edition – back for a limited time only.

Eau de Parfum. A sensory journey to the heart of Tokyo, where the softness of freshly made mochi is transformed into perfume.
A Mochi Atelier in Tokyo awakens the senses with the juicy sweetness of pear, followed by a warm and creamy rice accord that evokes the tender and comforting texture of this emblematic Japanese sweet. Sandalwood provides a serene, lightly woody base that envelops the skin with elegance.

Created by master perfumer Fabrice Pellegrin, this unique fragrance captures the calm, delicacy and intimacy of a moment shared in a small Tokyo workshop.

name: PINK FLAMBÉ SUMMER EDT 90 ML / 3.04 OZ
description: Eau de toilette. The summer version of Pink Flambé. A fresh and luminous fragrance with citrus notes of mandarin, lemon and orange, accompanied by the sweet and juicy touch of pear. Wonder Rose seduces with the sweetness of peach, red berries and a tutti-frutti accord, blended with sambac jasmine and the enveloping warmth of coconut and vanilla.

Fields at Nightfall Blush captures the essence of femininity, rounded out by creamy coconut water and sweet white caramel, creating a warm and inviting scent, ideal for any occasion.

This sparkling fragrance combines the freshness of apple with the floral softness of banana, awakening an instant connection. At its heart, macadamia nut adds a creamy, addictive warmth, while sandalwood envelops the skin with a sensual, lingering trail, like the sweet memory of an unexpected crush.

name: LUSH VANILLA EDP 50 ML (1.7 FL. OZ).
description:

name: CAPTIVATING VANILLA EDP 50 ML / 1.7 OZ

Captivating Vanilla explores its most sophisticated facet, enveloped in juicy fruits and creamy woods, while Lush Vanilla reveals its most gourmand side with notes of caramel, kiwi and soft spices. A celebration of vanilla in all its splendour: sweet, warm and deeply addictive.

Exclusive creations by perfumer Jérôme Epinette.

name: SPIRITED ROMANCE EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).
description:
Eau de parfum. A blend of fresh bergamot notes and a delicate floral bouquet, enhanced by the natural nuances of hyacinth and honeysuckle. Spirited Romance explores the powdery scent of iris and the delicacy of rose through a sophisticated and magnetic fragrance.

Olfactory notes: Honeysuckle, white flower bouquet, white musk.

Delicate intensity. An elegant and addictive fragrance that works for both everyday wear and special occasions.

name: SOMEDAY SOMETIMES EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ)
description:
Eau de parfum. Someday Sometimes combines fresh floral notes with undertones of patchouli and raspberry, resulting in an extremely accessible everyday perfume. Optimism and joy define a luminous fragrance, perfect for those who want to find their olfactory personality.

Olfactory notes: Rose, patchouli, raspberry.

Medium intensity. An accessible and uncomplicated fragrance that evokes the scent of clean laundry.

name: NOBODY KNOWS EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).
description:
Eau de parfum. Nobody Knows is a fragrance sculpted around the sweet effervescence of blackcurrant and spiced with black pepper, which gives it a great character, making it a provocative and fun fragrance. The woody and floral touch gives rise to a unique and highly addictive aroma.

Olfactory notes: Cassis, rose, ebony.

Intense. A well-rounded perfume with a long sillage and lasting power.

name: TRUE AMORE EDP 100ML (3.4 FL OZ)

Eau de parfum. True Amore embodies a femininity brimming with nuances thanks to its floral accords over a delicate base of vetiver and frankincense. The result is a long-lasting, timeless and insolently modern aroma that leaves an enchanting trail behind.

Olfactory notes: Grapefruit, rose, vetiver.

Medium intensity. An accessible and sophisticated fragrance for lovers of warm, feminine aromas.

name: VELVET SHADOW EDP 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ).
description:
Eau de parfum. The candy touch is provided by notes such as the marshmallow accord, while the sparkling counterpoint comes from ingredients such as mandarin or jasmine. Velvet Shadow is a prominently floral fragrance that is impossible to ignore, long-lasting and sweetened.

Olfactory notes: Bergamot, jasmine, marshmallow.

Medium intensity. A sweet and pleasant fragrance that evokes the sensory warmth of a hug without losing sophistication.

name: BLANC À PORTER EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).
description:
Eau de parfum. Blanc-à-Porter melts into the leather thanks to ingredients with musky hints such as ambrette, bergamot and cashmere wood, while enhancing the aroma of other fragrances. Try it as a layering exercise.

Olfactory notes: Ambrette, bergamot, cashmere wood.

Delicate intensity. A fragrance that, when used with others, allows you to create a unique and special aroma for those looking for a perfume that defines them.

Elegant and seductive.

As the fragrance develops, notes of Skin Musks create an aura of magnetic appeal with amber, while Whipped Vanilla adds a touch of decadence and warmth.

"Created for the bold and the intrepid, this fragrance invites you to a world where sensuality meets sophistication." - Jérôme Epinette
